name: Hanoi Old Quarter, dare you struck 7/8 of the iceberg?
description: A place called " Old " quarter of a 1000+ year old city should definitely be a must-see place. However, tourists' “experience”, no matter by themselves or by going on tour with local guides, was only 1/8 of the iceberg. We can't agree with some criticisms of commercializing, being modern and busy.As Hanoi proud-ers, we would like to instruct you to struck the 7/8 of the " ancient " iceberg.
